alert.note: Alert for Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Travis County through 915 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rollingwood, or over Austin, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Bee Cave, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Barton Creek, Onion Creek, Sunset Valley, Camp Mabry, McKinney Falls State Park, Lost Creek and Del Valle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
